containerDefinitions.name: ai-service
command: pip install fastapi uvicorn && mkdir -p /app && cd /app && python -c "import urllib.request; urllib.request.urlretrieve('https://riches-reach-ai-models-498606688292.s3.amazonaws.com/deployments/riches-reach-ai-latest.zip', '/tmp/code.zip'); import zipfile; zipfile.ZipFile('/tmp/code.zip').extractall('.'); import subprocess; subprocess.run(['uvicorn', 'main:app', '--host', '0.0.0.0', '--port', '8000'])"
